column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I called my salon and they said they had an opening that afternoon !
#text=I entered the salon and was greeted by my stylist .
#text=She escorted me to her chair and took some time running her hands through my hair and asking me lots of questions about how I wanted to style it and how I typically wore it .
#text=She led me to the sink and washed my hair , then brought me back to comb it out .
#text=She started cutting some layers into it and slowly worked her way around my head .
#text=When she was finished , she blow dryed my hair with a big round brush .
#text=Once my hair was dried and styled , she tidied it up with a hair straightener and some smoothing gel .
#text=I was so happy with my new cut !
#text=I walked to the front desk and paid and made another appointment and noticed I had a bounce in my step because the haircut had been such a '' `` pick me up '' '' !
